quote: When you don't have another option, but for it to work, it has to work. And you figure out how to make it work.
why_clipworthy: It encapsulates the determination required to overcome adversity.
suggested_hook: What would you do if failure wasn't an option?

quote: I would go to a coffee shop and introduce myself to everyone there. Eventually, I started buying everyone's coffee for a couple of hours.
why_clipworthy: A unique and actionable networking strategy that stands out.
suggested_hook: Want to grow your network? Try this bold coffee shop strategy!
